ComicInfo.Title: Trust No One
ComicInfo.Summary: Trust No One: Barry is found dead, and the League tries to determine who killed him. Batgirl and Nightwing face vampires in Gotham, while Penguin also finds himself on the run from them. Batman and Jayna search for Barry's killer and for her missing brother Zan. Robin encounters Black Canary, who is working with Green Arrow and Arsenal to uncover hidden vampires. Wonder Woman confronts Hal and learns that he is a vampire and is responsible for Barry's death.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-23 01:23:26. [CVDB900149] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:49:05. [Issue ID 2293868]
